anathema: Lose your motivation to your regrets, spread despair, treat a loved one poorly
edict: Give yourself fully to everything you attempt, always maintain hope that tomorrow will be a better day, treasure every gift you are given by those who matter to you
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Tlehar (The Rising Sun)](/Deities.aspx?ID=681)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 18

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) This deity grants [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1570) instead of dreaming potential_

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Give yourself fully to everything you attempt, always maintain hope that tomorrow will be a better day, treasure every gift you are given by those who matter to you

**Anathema** Lose your motivation to your regrets, spread despair, treat a loved one poorly

**Area of Concern**
Iron, love, rebirth

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

**Favored Weapon** [Morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=363)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=66), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=92)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1678)

- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=1516)

- **5th**
[Dreaming Potential](/Spells.aspx?ID=1504)

</column>
name: Tlehar (The Rising Sun)
